Recommended action: Investigate login attempts and implement CAPTCHA or multi-factor authentication.
Block access to phishing URLs and educate users on identifying phishing attempts.
Investigate potential scraping or DDoS activity, throttle excessive requests.
Monitor large data transfers, investigate for potential data exfiltration.
Review access logs for suspicious IPs, consider blacklisting malicious IPs.
Investigate unusual access to sensitive or unauthorized categories (e.g., HR documents).
